entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of the twins who cast a spell to retrieve their brooms.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is the other twin who cast a spell to retrieve their brooms.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is a professor who had fastened Fred and George's broomsticks to the wall.

relationships.description: Fred and George cooperated with each other by casting a spell together to retrieve their brooms.
Fred had a conflict with Umbridge, as he told her they wouldn't be seeing her.
